tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had been to see Dr. Sujatha for a minor problem for my teenage daughter. The first thing which strikes is her friendliness. She connects with her patient more like a friend than a doc. Never met such a sweetest person. And absolutely practical suggesting so many lifestyle changes , nutrition etc etc. . With two teenage daughters I am relieved and blessed to have found such a wonderful doctor.
reply_text: Thank u for your lovely feedback.Happy to have connected with you.

review: Wonderful experience with Sujatha mam. She's very understanding and listens my concerns. She takes time with the patient to help them with their health issues.very friendly.Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It's rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a fertility specialist.

Consulted the doctor for heavy bleeding during periods. Very much comfortable and Caring treatment. I am VERY much satisfied with Dr. Sujatha Mam's treatment. Surely I recommend her for the best consultation and treatment.
reply_text: Thank u for ur kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had visited for my wife's Pavithra.R pregnancy confirmation Mam's diagnostic method was excellent very very satisfied. we got a new energy after meeting doctor and are happy now.
reply_text: Your expression of kindness is extremely acknowledged and appreciated by our clinic. We are remarkably delighted to have you as our patient in our clinic (Wellness Woman Clinic'Mogappair)

review: we visited the doctor clinic for copper T insertion procedure .she said to visit Balaji hospital the next day and did not even inform us the cost of procedure before hand . after the copper T insertion procedure the balaji hospital handed us an bill of 4500 which is way too costly **** *** ** ****** *********** request people to never go to Balaji hospital. **** **** ****** *** ** **** **** ****** *****
Went for pregnancy check long back.I was completely satisfied with the monthly check ups.all things were taken care of perfectly.overall a good experience.
Doctor is friendly and caring. Responds immediately. Satisfied with her consult. Will recommend to my friends.
Very friendly explanation of the issue and steps to be taken. We consulted as per the appointment time without any delays.
She is an asset to the public the doctor was on time and friendly less crowded and given clear guidance on how to proceed further with the pregnancy
reply_text: Thank u for your kind words

review:
Visited for Pregnancy 

Honestly , I liked her approach when I initially visited her , but for follow ups , I wont suggest her. Her response over whatsapp is not timely. She is focused on fees and nothing else.
reply_text: What's app is not the platform always for medical query but emergency acceptable.In all these years first one to comment that I am focused on fees.Thanks anyway,all my patients know how am I
